message.name: ERR_SPG_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Service Plan Group with the name specified already exists.

message.name: ERR_SPG_DESC_MISSING
message.locale: The description for the Service Plan Group was not provided.

message.name: ERR_SPG_DESC_BLANK
message.locale: The description for the Service Plan Group cannot be empty.

message.name: ERR_SPG_ACTIVE_SERVICEPLAN_DELIVERIES
message.locale: The Service Plan Group cannot be deleted because there are active Service Plan Deliveries linked to the Service Plan Group.

message.name: ERR_SPG_MODIFY_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This service plan group is canceled and cannot be modified.
This service plan group is cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SPG_REMOVE_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This service plan group has already been canceled.
This service plan group has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SPG_LINK_ACTIVE_SERVICEPLANDELIVERIES
message.locale: The association cannot be deleted at this time because there are one or more open Service Plan Cases in the system which belong to the associated Service Plan Group.

message.name: ERR_SPG_DUPLICATE_SP
message.locale: The Service Plan cannot be linked to the Service Plan Group because an Active Service Plan of the same type is already linked.

message.name: ERR_SPG_ID_NULL
message.locale: The Service Plan Group Delivery cannot be created because there is Service Plan Group defined.

message.name: INF_SPG_NO_ACTIVE_SERVICEPLANGROUPS
message.locale: No Service Plan Groups are available. Please contact an administrator.
